title: Pound dips after UK economy grinds to a halt in July with no growth in GDP – business live
summary: The UK economy remains stagnant, with the Treasury spokesperson acknowledging a feeling of being "stuck" after the GDP showed no change in July. This lack of growth raises concerns about the country's economic vitality. The situation highlights ongoing challenges faced by the UK economy amid global uncertainties.
